basics.name: Luis Alejandro Anaya Marin
basics.label: Mid-level Fullstack developer specialized in Next.js, Tailwind CSS and Sanity CMS.
basics.summary: +4 years of experience as an in-house and freelance developer, either building end-to-end sites/apps or helping businesses enhance their digital presence. Based in Madrid, I currently collaborate remotely with clients and companies from the US, Spain, and the UK. I've worked solo or as a team member on a wide range of projects, from legacy code migrations and full visual redesigns to complex CMS setups and SEO optimizations.

work.name: Nuela
work.summary: Designed and developed a SaaS platform for the education industry (schedule creation and teacher substition). Worked on the full stack, from the database to the front-end, using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase. Collaborated with the design team to create a user-friendly interface and a responsive design.

work.name: LGR (UK) LTD
work.summary: Helped small business owners in the digitalization process of their businesses. Led full migrations of legacy codebases, revamped inneficient design systems, implemented new features, modernized outdated UX/UI practices, and set up content management systems. Focused on performance, SEO optimization, and web vitals to improve the client's search results rankings.

work.name: Bukitt
work.summary: Developed two marketing/blog websites for the luxury travel agency Bukitt and its Camino de Santiago spin-off, Bukitt Camino. UX/UI design from scratch. Setup CMS for non-tech savvy marketing team members. Created branding, optimzed SEO, and designed automated marketing email system. Collaborated in the design of visual marketing material and social media strategies.

work.name: LAAM.DEV
work.summary: Developed and designed from scratch several marketing sites, e-commerces, digital portfolios, SaaS dashboards, and productivity apps for a wide range of clients. Currently have 10+ live websites built on top of the latest features and concepts of the Next.js and Astro ecosystems (Server Actions, RSC, Astro Studio, etc.)

education.area: MA in Postproduction and Sound Design
BA in Media Studies and Film (bilingual)
